key.name: storage-provider
key.description: Which storage backend to use: "github", "nextcloud", or "googledrive"

key.name: nextcloud-url
key.description: Base URL of your Nextcloud server (e.g. https://cloud.example.com)

key.name: nextcloud-username
key.description: Your Nextcloud username

key.name: nextcloud-password
key.description: App password for Nextcloud WebDAV access

key.name: nextcloud-folder
key.description: Folder name in your Nextcloud storage for synced profiles

key.name: github-username
key.description: Your GitHub username for repository access

key.name: github-repo
key.description: Name of the private repository to use for config sync

key.name: github-token
key.description: Personal access token with repo permissions

key.name: gdrive-goa-account-id
key.description: GNOME Online Account ID for Google Drive sync. Empty = auto-select first available.

key.name: gdrive-folder-name
key.description: Name of the root folder in Google Drive for synced profiles

key.name: auto-sync-on-login
key.description: Automatically restore configuration when logging in

key.name: auto-sync-on-logout
key.description: Automatically backup configuration when logging out

key.name: auto-sync-on-change
key.description: Automatically sync when monitored files or settings change

key.name: change-sync-delay
key.description: Seconds to wait after a change before syncing (debouncing)

key.name: polling-enabled
key.description: Periodically check remote storage for changes

key.name: polling-interval
key.description: How often to poll remote storage for changes (in minutes)

key.name: auto-sync-remote-changes
key.description: Automatically download and apply changes when detected via polling

key.name: sync-wallpapers
key.description: Include desktop and lock screen wallpapers in sync (may be large files)

key.name: trigger-initial-sync
key.description: Internal flag to trigger manual initial sync from preferences

key.name: gsettings-schemas
key.description: List of GSettings schemas to monitor and sync

key.name: sync-files
key.description: List of files to monitor for changes and sync to the repository
